data.text: Wooiti Amɔse ná-doun zunui Ezayi ti zɔlɔɔni GALA zea kulakɛlɛmai zu, é ʋilɛ Zuda masadai ʋa, ta Zeluzalɛme taai.
Yeeɠɛɠala ɠaaɓelagiti ta zeelina,
Zii ɠiligiti ta ɠɛ liizu ná, ti ɗa ɠɛ ma:
Toɠa zaamazu logi wo zii wolaiti zɔɠɔzu,
Zakɔɓe mavofodaiti, à ʋa deɠɛmu,
Maliɠii, è la mɔ ɗa-nuɓusɛiti pɔ, Zakɔɓe mavofodaiti.
Ná-zooi laavegɛ ga walii ta zanugi,
Ná-zooi zulaavegɛ ga zɛɛ ɠalagiti ɓalaa,
Naa ɠa é ba, nuɓusɛi pɛ maanɛɛʋɛ ga é ɓɔɠɔmaayei,
À lɔɔɠu fasa yeɠeiti su,
Nuɓusɛiti ta-ɠaazumaanɛɛiti gaa ɠa yei,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii folo ɠila deveʋɛ,
Toɠa ɠɛ Liɓan sɛdele guluiti daalɔɠɔma,
Toɠa ɠɛ gize ɠaaɠoozagi pɛ daalɔɠɔma
Toɠa ɠɛ siɠi gaaɠoozagiti daalɔɠɔma,
Toɠa ɠɛ Taalasise ɓatoiti daalɔɠɔma
Nuɓusɛiti ta-ɠaazumaanɛɛiti gaa ɠa yei,
Zɛɛ ɠalagiti kpein ta ɲɛɛlɛ.
Nuiti ta lɔ pugiti su,
Naama volo ná, zɛɛ ɠalagiti ti ga walii ta zanugiti,
Nuiti ta lɔ pugiti su,
À ɓe ɠalivaazu nuɓusɛi ma,
